## NFTCollection.generateSignatureBatch() method

Genrate a batch of signatures that can be used to mint many dynamic NFTs.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
generateSignatureBatch(mintRequests: PayloadToSign[]): Promise<SignedPayload[]>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  mintRequests | PayloadToSign\[\] |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;SignedPayload\[\]&gt;

an array of payloads and signatures

See [NFTCollection.generateSignature()](./sdk.nftcollection.generatesignature.md)
